title: Hasslong
author: Hasslong
content: Are there any good topics video or picture learning step by step the verification

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Any of these two links should be of help: [GUIDE] How to Safely Download and Verify Electrum [Guide]                                                                         How to Verify an Electrum Download on Windows

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Hasslong on May 19, 2023, 10:32:47 PMAre there any good topics video or picture learning step by step the verification If you prefer a video tutorial, I found a helpful resource on how to verify Electrum signatures using GPG software on Windows. You can check out this YouTube video: Keep you Bitcoin Safe from Phishing and Scams. Verifying Electrum Download Signatures via GPG4Win.If you have any doubts or need further information about verifying Electrum wallet or any other aspects of using Electrum, it's always a good idea to check the official Electrum documentation. The official Electrum documentation can be found at https://electrum.readthedocs.io.
